sections.instructor: Panahandeh, Mohammad, Prerequisite: PHYS-130 and MATH-193 or equivalents Advisory: MATH-194 or equivalent Note: This is an online asynchronous class for the labs and lectures. Labs are problem -solving sessions. There are 3 in-person meetings for the two midterms and the final exam.  These meetings are scheduled on Thursdays 3/5, 4/23 and 5/21, from 4:00 to 6:00pm. For first week of the class there will be a mandatory synchronous Zoom meeting on January 29 from 4:00 pm to 6:00 pm to review the course content. The instructions will be provided via the internet through the college learning management system CANVAS and Zoom software.  Access to a computer with audio and video capability is required. Go to www.dvc.edu/online for course access information.

prerequisites: PHYS-130 and MATH-193 or equivalents Advisory: MATH-194 or equivalent
